name: Huevos Rancheros Wraps
preparation: In mixing bowl, whisk eggs with dip mix and water and set aside.
Heat oil in a fry pan over medium heat. Add egg mixture. Stir constantly for 5–6 min or until eggs are set.
Microwave tortillas until warm and place on individual plates. Meanwhile drain and rinse black beans.
Top each tortilla with egg mixture and black beans, add salsa and cheese. Fold over or roll up and serve immediately.
tips: Fold tortillas in half and grill to make quesadillas. Slice and serve!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced veggies and top with 1 tbsp prepared Nacho Cheese Dip.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.
